SEARCH
Package com.example.tundra_snow_app.Models

Class Events

java.lang.Object
com.example.tundra_snow_app.Models.Events
public class Events extends Object
Represents an event within the application. It encapsulates details such as the event's ID, organizer, title, description, dates, location, and participants.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Events

      public Events()
      No-argument constructor (required by Firestore). Initializes empty lists for participants.

    • Events

      public Events(String eventID, String ownerID, String title, String description, String posterImageURL, String location, String published, Date startDate, Date endDate, Date registrationEndDate, Date registrationStartDate, int capacity, String qrHash, String status, List<String> confirmedList, List<String> declinedList, List<String> entrantList, List<String> cancelledList, List<String> chosenList)
      Constructor for the Events class. Initializes the event's properties.
      Parameters:
      eventID - Unique event identifier
      ownerID - Organizer's ID
      title - Event title
      description - Event description
      posterImageURL - URL of the poster image
      location - Event location
      published - Publication status
      startDate - Event start date
      endDate - Event end date
      registrationEndDate - Registration end date
      registrationStartDate - Registration start date
      capacity - Event capacity
      qrHash - QR code hash for validation
      status - Event status
      confirmedList - List of confirmed attendees
      declinedList - List of declined attendees
      entrantList - List of entrants
      cancelledList - List of cancelled participants
      chosenList - List of chosen participants
